name: Salamander Noble
description: The Salamander Noble is a massive creature exuding heat and fire, with a strong muscular build and features that evoke the essence of flames.
memorable: Its Heated Body trait inflicts fire damage on grappling foes, making it both physically strong and dangerous.
goals: To dominate combat situations and inflict damage with fire-based attacks.
relations: Often found in the company of other fire elementals or creatures from volcanic and hot environments.
environment: Typically inhabits areas of extreme heat, such as volcanoes or lava fields.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage and the ability to deal multiple types of damage in combat.
weaknesses: Susceptible to cold damage which can disable some of its abilities.
attacks: Capable of performing a multiattack with its tail and pike, dealing bludgeoning and piercing damage, along with fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath: exhale fire in a 30-foot cone dealing significant damage to multiple foes.
additional_information: Heated Body inflicts fire damage on grappling foes.
Can automatically hit restrained targets with tail attacks.
Fire attacks can affect multiple targets simultaneously.
test_queries: creature that breathes fire in a cone
